title: Crystal River, FL Acupuncture Benefits | Acupuncture in Inverness
description: Acupuncture helps create and maintain health through the stimulation of specific points on the body.
cleaned_text: Acupuncture helps create and maintain health through the stimulation of specific points on the body. These techniques help with stress, pain and restore the body's energy flows. Using ancient Chinese medicine techniques our licensed Acupuncturists will assess your conditions and treat using: - Acupuncture Needles - Acupuncture with Electrical Stimulation - Cupping - Infrared - TuiNa - Acupressure - Treatment without needles also available
